short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy multiple items to the clipboard and view them easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipboard Manager (Multi Copy & Paste)

Clipboard Manager is your essential tool for managing multiple clipboard entries efficiently. Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone who deals with a lot of text, this extension saves time by allowing you to easily copy, store, and retrieve multiple clipboard items. Enhance your productivity with features like:

What's new?
- We have enabled a shortcut to quickly open the clipboard by just pressing Ctrl/CMD + Shift + V
- Enhanced UI for pop-up which also shows complete text on hover if it's too long
- Repeat content copy is deduped i.e. you won't see them twice!
- A zero state to give tips on best use
- New Logo!

Multiple Clipboard Entries: Store unlimited clipboard items for later use.
- Quick Access: Retrieve clipboard entries quickly with a simple click.
-Seamless Integration: Works across all websites, ensuring your clipboard is always at your fingertips.
-Secure and Private: Your data is stored locally and never shared or accessed by third parties.

Say goodbye to the limitations of the single clipboard and unlock a world of efficiency with Clipboard Manager.
